reviewText: This is the absolute best way to learn sign language!  My daughter absolutely loves this and so do I! It is funny and you really learn alot!  Please make more dvds to this series.  Thank you for a great product! If you want to learn sign, this is absolutely the way to learn it.

Sign Language Series: Shut Up and Sign #2 - "We Are Family"This is the second in the series of the American Sign Language crazy guy Bob Hiltermann who uses a variety of fun and engaging music and props to help teach the ASL alphabet and assorted other neat things. You learn in spite of laughing! Fun for all the kids and not so kids!
The music videos are a hoot, who knew you could learn so much while having that much fun! I share this series with everyone I can.

This dvd is excellent. I have bought almost all dvd on asl and none were very good. This dvd puts them all to shame.
It is funny and educational. You can not go wrong with this dvd
